description.en:
The internship will be carried out over a four-week period in the partner organisations ( e.g. Estonian
Government Office, Estonian Information System Authority, NATO StratCom Coe, Baltic Engagement
Center for Information Disorders that is part of the EDMO network and others) and supervised by the
university.
description.et: Praktika sooritatakse nelja nädala jooksul õppekava haldaja partnerorganisatsioonides ja ülikooli poolt toimub superviseeritud juhendamine.

objectives.en:
The aim of the traineeship is to put the theoretical and analytical knowledge into practice and gain
experience of working in organisations dealing with disinformation and strategic communication.
objectives.et: Praktika eesmärgiks on rakendada õpitud teoreetilisi ja analüütilisi teadmisi praktikas ning omandada kogemus töös desinformatsiooni ja strateegilise kommunikatsiooniga tegelevates organisatsioonides.

learning_outcomes.en:
- applies theoretical and analytical knowledge acquired during the studies and is able to solve
problems encountered in practical work;
learning_outcomes.et: - rakendab õpingute käigus omandatud teoreetilisi ja analüütilisi teadmisi ja oskab lahendada praktilises töös ettetulevaid probleeme;

learning_outcomes.en:
- applies the regulations, high ethical standards and best practices in the field when solving practical
problems;
learning_outcomes.et: - lähtub praktiliste probleemide lahendamisel valdkonnas kehtivatest regulatsioonidest, eetilistest standarditest ja headest tavadest;

learning_outcomes.en: - creates an international supportive professional network for future work.
learning_outcomes.et: - loob oma edasiseks tööks vajaliku rahvusvahelise erialase võrgustiku.

independent_work.en: Find instructions with the guide for the internship in Moodle

description.en: Successfully completed internships have been performed by the student and accompanied by a final report in accordance with Moodle's instructions, in a timely manner.
description.et: Arvestatud saavad praktikad, mille sooritanud tudeng on vastavalt Moodle juhistele koostanud lõppraporti ning selle õigeaegselt esitanud.

description.en: The presentation has been uploaded to Moodle a week earlier and covers all components of the final report.
description.et: Esitlus on nädal varem Moodlesse üles laetud ning katab kõiki lõppraporti komponente.

grade_preconditions.en: The internship has been completed and the report has been uploaded.
grade_preconditions.et: Praktika on sooritatud ning praktikaaruanne on üles laetud.

grade_evaluation.en: 80p/100p final report. 20p/100p presentation and defense of the internship at the colloquium meet.
grade_evaluation.et: 80p/100p lõppraport. 20p/100p esitlus ja praktika kaitsmine kollokviumil.

debt_elimination.en: Only by special agreement with the responsible lecturer.
